banner2.p: El casabe, al ser un producto 100% natural aporta hidratos de carbono en abundancia, permite que sea un alimento que brinda la energia para afrontar el dia a dia. El Casabe tiene 9% de fibra. Es un alimento que se puede mezclar con miles de productos, ingredientes y sabores no solo de la comida dominicana sino con las cocinas del mundo.

banner.h3_2: they are a reflection of quality

banner2.p: The casabe, being a 100% natural product provides abundant carbohydrates, allows it to be a food that provides energy to face the day to day. The Casabe has 9% fiber. It is a food that can be mixed with thousands of products, ingredients and flavors not only of Dominican food but with the cuisines of the world.

productos.prodDesc: It is a line of artisan casabe made in two denominations, premium and regular.
productos.prodDesc2: This Casabe offers the best of the northwest area, which maintains its long-standing tradition of production, offering them in a wide variety of sizes and a combination of spices and ingredients from the area.
